speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Karen from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Karen, I'm doing well, thank you. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding your account with City Finance. To ensure your privacy, could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also verify your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you for confirming your identity. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. Can I take your payment method for the $100?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! Please provide your card number.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! Your payment has been processed. You will receive a confirmation via email.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Karen. Have a great day!
